attributes.action: I think the universal credit payment after losing a job should be change.
attributes.additional_details: No one should have to wait this long for anymoney if it was job seekers you get something after 2 weeks why is it with universal credit you have to wait months!
attributes.background: I lost my job at Amazon out no fault off my own  my assessment is from the 5th to 4th off every month i only got paid 400 for January  I'm expect to live on that to 10 March how is that fair when you have to pay bills and rent and travel money this should be look at 9 weeks to get any money is wrong

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
